## Firearms and Toolmarks Comparison Algorithms

### CRAN Packages

- [`cmcR`](https://github.com/CSAFE-ISU/cmcR): An Implementation of the 'Congruent Matching Cells' Method

### GitHub Packages

- [`impressions`](https://github.com/jzemmels/impressions): An R package for diagnosing cartridge case impression comparison algorithms

### Interactive Applications

- [`cartridgeInvestigatR`](https://jzemmels.shinyapps.io/cartridgeinvestigatR/): process and compare cartridge case scans
